entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the evening. Freezing rain over northern sections. Rainfall amount 20 mm over southern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
